purpose: Assist developers by generating practical and functional code snippets to accelerate the development process
principle: Leverages AI models to understand user input and generate relevant code in JavaScript and TypeScript
reusability: Designed as a plug-and-play tool that integrates with development environments; supports API-based interactions
limitations: Currently focused on JavaScript and TypeScript; may require additional configuration for specific environments
name: micro-agent
description: An AI agent that writes (actually useful) code for you
highlight: Generates useful and functional code snippets tailored to user needs
